name: Courier Quest
description:
Welcome, Courier! Your job is to deliver messages all across the Land!

Your task is all about Speed and Memory! You may accept many tasks at once, but that means you'll have to memorize lots of names!

Good luck, Courier!

Move : WASD (Keyboard) / Press-hold (Touchscreen)

Action: SPACE (Keyboard) / Tap (Touchscreen)

Minimap: Hold SPACE (Keyboard) / Double-Tap (Touchscreen)

Works on Mobile!! (If it crashes using WebGl, then best option is to download and install the  ".apk")

---------------------------------------------------------------

In this game I tried to make a Quest System and tried to use more of the New Input System.  Also tried to make the build as small as possible following some tips and compressing the audio. Reference below.

Any questions, feel free to ask!
